description: Standard measurements for a medium-sized tote bag

measurements.name: Width
measurements.description: Width of the front panel at the top

measurements.name: Height
measurements.description: Height from bottom to top of the front panel

measurements.name: Bottom Width
measurements.description: Width of the front panel at the bottom

measurements.name: Width
measurements.description: Width of the back panel at the top

measurements.name: Height
measurements.description: Height from bottom to top of the back panel

measurements.name: Bottom Width
measurements.description: Width of the back panel at the bottom

measurements.name: Width
measurements.description: Width of the side panel at the top

measurements.name: Height
measurements.description: Height from bottom to top of the side panel

measurements.name: Bottom Width
measurements.description: Width of the side panel at the bottom

measurements.name: Length
measurements.description: Length of the bottom panel (front to back)

measurements.name: Width
measurements.description: Width of the bottom panel (side to side)

measurements.name: Attachment Distance
measurements.description: Distance from the edge of the panel to the handle attachment point

assembly.description: Attach front panel to bottom panel
Attach back panel to bottom panel
Attach side panels to front, back, and bottom panels
Attach handles to front and back panels
